user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to Cameroon and I want to stay updated with the latest news. Can you provide me with the top news articles from Instant Cameroon News? Also, I'm interested in knowing the political figures in Cameroon. Could you fetch me the details of a politician with the goverlytics_id 437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190?
